column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei yɛbɛka dɛn? Ana yɛbɛda ho atsena bɔn mu
column3: ma adom no adɔɔ so anaa?"

column2: "Dabida. Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na hɛn a yewui maa bɔn yɛbɛda ho atsena ase wɔ bɔn mu?"
"Ana hom nnyim dɛ hɛn a wonumaa hɛn hyɛɛ Kraest Jesus mu no nyina
column3: wonumaa hɛn hyɛɛ no wu mu?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔnam enuma mu esie yɛnye no wɔ owu mu
column3: ma dɛ mbrɛ wɔnam Egya no n’enyimnyam do nyaan Kraest fii ewufo mu no
column4: dɛmara so na hɛn so yaanantsew nkwa fofor mu."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔatsɛw hɛn nye Kraest abɔ mu kor wɔ no wu mu a
column3: nna yɛnam no wusoɛr no do nye no bɔbɔ mu kor so efifir."

column2: "Na yenyim dɛ wɔbɔɔ hɛn nyimpa dadaw no nye no mbeamudua mu
column3: ma bɔn nyimpadua no eewu

column2: "na nyia oewu no
column3: woebu no bem wɔ bɔn ho."

column2: "Na sɛ yɛnye Kraest wui a
column3: yɛgye dzi dɛ yɛnye no bɛtsena ase so;"

column2: "osiandɛ yenyim dɛ Kraest a wonyaan no fii ewufo mu no runnwu bio
column3: owu nndzi no do tum bio."

column2: "Na owu a owui no
column3: owui maa bɔn prɛko
column4: na ase a ɔtse no ɔtse ma Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Dɛmara so na hom mbubu hom ho dɛ hom ewu ama bɔn
column3: na hom tse ase ma Nyankopɔn wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom mma bɔn nndzi hen wɔ hom nyimpadua a obowu no mu
column3: dɛ hom betsie no wɔ n’akɔndɔ mu;"

column2: "eso mma hom nngyaa hom nyimpadua mfafakuwa mma bɔn dɛ brakyew edwindadze
column3: na mbom hom mfa homho mma Nyankopɔn dɛ hɔn a woefi ewufo mu tse ase
column4: na hom ngyaa hom nyimpadua mfafakuwa mma Nyankopɔn dɛ tsenenee edwindadze."

column2: "Na bɔn rinndzi hom do tum bio; osiandɛ hom nnyi mbra ase
column3: na mbom hom wɔ adom ase."

column2: "Afei ebɛn asɛm a? Dɛ yennyi mbra ase na yɛwɔ adom ase ntsi
column3: yɛnyɛ bɔn anaa? Dabida."

column2: "Ana hom nnyim dɛ onyia hom egyaa homho ama no dɛ nkowaa dɛ hom betsie no no
column3: sɛ bɔn a ɔdze kɔ owu mu dze o
column4: setsie a ɔdze kɔ tsenenee mu o
column5: ɔno a hom tsie no no no nkowaa nye hom?"

column2: "Na ndaase nka Nyankopɔn dɛ nkyɛ hom yɛ bɔn nkowaa
column3: na afei hom fi hom akoma mu ayɛ setsie ama nkyerɛkyerɛ soronko a wɔdze hom hyɛɛ mu no."

column2: "Na woeyi hom efi bɔn no nkowaasom ase
column3: na hom abɛyɛ tsenenee no nkowaa."

column2: "Mekasa wɔ nyimpa afamu wɔ hom honam ne mberɛwyɛ ntsi dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ hom gyaa hom nyimpadua mfafakuwa dɛ nkowaa maa efifidze nye emumuyɛ dze kɔr emumuyɛ mu no
column4: dɛmara na afei hom ngyaa hom nyimpadua mfafakuwa dɛ nkowaa mma tsenenee nkɔ ahotsewee mu."

column2: "Na hom yɛɛ bɔn nkowaa no
column3: hom twee homho fii tsenenee ho."

column2: "Ebɛn aba na hom nyaa no wɔ ber no mu wɔ ndzɛmba a afei ɔyɛ hom fɛr no mu? Na ndzɛmba no n’ewiei nye owu."
"Na afei hom enya hom fahodzi efi bɔn ho
column3: na hom abɛyɛ Nyankopɔn nkowaa yi
column4: hom wɔ hom aba a ɔdze kɔ ahotsewee mu

column2: "Na bɔn akatua nye owu
column3: na Nyankopɔn n’adom akyɛdze nye onnyiewiei nkwa a ɔwɔ hɛn Ewuradze Kraest Jesus mu."
